attributes.action: Award the NHS the "George Cross" our highest civilian honour.
attributes.additional_details: We need to say thank you, in a way that will never be forgotten. To show  our gratitude as a nation
attributes.background: To show the countries gratitude to the NHS. For their hard work and sacrifice, during the Covid pandemic. Can they, as an entity be awarded the "George Cross", our countries highest civilian honour, as the population of Malta was during World War II

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
